Documentation.content: Return the value of the log gamma function of the absolute value of X. A wrapper for the standard C lgamma function. Avoids the race condition found on some platforms by taking the absolute value of the of the input argument.
Documentation.return: the value of the log of the GAMMA evaluated at ABS(x)
Documentation.firstline: Return the value of the log gamma function of the absolute value of X
